name: Construction Metaverse VR
description:
Many sectors boom the economic status of both developed and developing countries, construction industry is said to be one of the most important sectors that helps to raise the economic status of any nation in terms of their contribution to gross domestic product (GDP).

Construction VR is an Advanced Educational VR Application that is purposely Aimed at replacing the on-paper examination that is conducted by the international body HSE, HEALTH SAFETY AND ENVIRONMENT exams, the HSE exams are very important in any engineering working environment and are required by workers in the engineering working environment to have the certificate, now our scope is focusing mainly in the Construction aspect of the HSE to take it beyond a paper examination, to immerse the particular worker in the construction environment and show them the hazard that will happen in contrast to asking them from a paper examination, This won't only serve as an exam as it will also be a train for the workers as they won't need to be on the real site to experience how things should be done there.

 This project is aimed to provide learning from different perspectives of the construction site such as safety in the construction site, and training in using the different site machinery.

CORE TECHNOLOGY - This project was made with kinds different software but the main software that was utilized is Unity with XR Interaction Toolkit.

Github Repo-     https://github.com/Ajibade-Quwiyu/Construction_Metaverse_Hackathon
